definition[0]: to live or do something without a particular thing
example[0]: I don’t have any sugar so you’ll have to do without.
example[1]: You can do without a carpet but you’ve got to have somewhere to sit.
definition[1]: used to say that something is annoying you or causing you problems
example[2]: You can do without all that hassle.
example[3]: Those are the type of stupid remarks I can do without.
